item.title: OMVS Encoding
item.author: Author
item.description: This characters bracket characters [ ] and others that don’t convert to a readable form was driving me crazy. enter this command when starting a USS session: omvs convert((BPXFX111)) Example, in man pages converts this line: pax Ã-cdEnvzÂ¨Ã-H|-LÂ¨Ã-f archiveÂ¨ Ã-o typeÂ¨ Ã-s substituteÂ¨ … Ãpattern …Â¨ to this line: pax [-cdEnvz][-H|-L][-f archive] [-o type] [-s substitute] … [pattern …] much easier to read. ðŸ‘ IBM Link OMVS command
